system.description:
Time: 15âˆ’RSI seconds+Ritual: Silent Prayer
Range: Self/Touch+Duration: RSI mins.

Transforms a staff into a brown and yellow striped serpent for Duration. The serpent is normally held and used like a staff in combat, but its impact is a poisonous bite. The serpent can also be dropped to do this work alone. Venom has a Healing Rate of H3 (MS) or H1 (CS); 1 minute between rolls. With CF, the invoker suffers a H3 bite.
